main_definition: The abbreviation 'aka' stands for 'also known as', used to introduce alternative names or titles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A name or title by which someone or something is also recognized.
meanings_and_examples.example: Albert Einstein, aka The Father of Modern Physics

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used in writing to introduce an alternate name for a book, film, or person.
meanings_and_examples.example: The Hunger Games, aka Suzanne Collins' dystopian novel turned blockbuster movie.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A casual way of saying 'also called' in spoken English.
meanings_and_examples.example: I used to go by the name John Smith. Now you can call me Akira.
